elements.title: espresso and tonic (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that even though espresso is Italian, espresso and tonic (pictured) originated in Scandinavia?

elements.title: Charles Merlin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the banker Charles Merlin played a major role in the trafficking of antiquities between Greece and London in the 19th century?

elements.title: The Oxford Guide to the Book of Common Prayer: A Worldwide Survey (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that The Oxford Guide to the Book of Common Prayer: A Worldwide Survey made historian Alec Ryrie suspect "there is such a thing as 'Anglicanism' after all"?

elements.title: Civana Kuhlmann (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Civana Kuhlmann overcame four surgeries during her college soccer career to make her professional debut in 2023?

elements.title: Lunar Surface Magnetometer (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Apollo Lunar Surface Magnetometer experiments confirmed the existence of permanent magnetic fields on the surface of the Moon?

elements.title: his comic from which the film was adapted (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that writer Ed Brubaker earned more from the residuals for his cameo appearance in the film Captain America: The Winter Soldier than he did for his comic from which the film was adapted?

elements.title: Tjarda Struik (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Tjarda Struik is the Netherlands' first female mayor to be nearly blind, and a TikTok influencer?

elements.title: stinking tutsan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that stinking tutsan smells like goat?
